title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 156.7 - Commercial activity, solicitation of funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 156.7 - Commercial activity, solicitation of funds

State Regulations
(a) No person other than those authorized by
the Commissioner of Transportation, pursuant to section
88, subdivision
10, of the Highway

Law, shall carry on any commercial activity in any rest or parking area or
scenic overlook. No person shall solicit funds for any purpose in any rest or
parking area or scenic overlook. (b) The prohibition against commercial
activity shall not operate to prevent the use, in the normal course of travel, of rest or parking areas or scenic overlooks by commercial vehicles bearing
advertisements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
156.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
